page.title: 16A Typical Day.
page.content: I get up at 7.30a.m. and have a wash and get dressed. I go downstairs and have my breakfast. I go back upstairs and clean my teeth and get my things ready for school. I walk to school with my friends and when the teacher blows the whistle we go inside to our classroom. Our teacher takes the register and the dinner numbers, then wego down to the hall for assembly. We come back upstairs and have English uil 10.30a.m. when we have break, for 15 minutes.We have Maths until lunchtime, which is at 12.00. I am a server, and serve the other six on my table.When we have finished ,we play out until 1.30p.m. and have lessons all afternoon.We go home at 3..30p.m. and I play until tea time. I help to wash up, and then wath television until 9.00p.m. when I get undressed and go to bed.
